subject: Football
Concussions
Brain
lead_paragraph: Stewart Bradley stumbled to the turf and needed to be helped off the field, but was on the field minutes later, indicating that players were still cleared inappropriately after being hit in the head.
snippet: Stewart Bradley stumbled to the turf and needed to be helped off the field, but was on the field minutes later, indicating that players were still cleared inappropriately after being hit in the head.
